faq.a: Yes—our sorbets are dairy‑free and many flavours can be made without toppings containing allergens.
We prepare with care, but traces of milk, eggs, gluten, soy, or nuts may remain as we use shared equipment.
We’re take‑away and sit‑in. For party tubs, please phone or WhatsApp to arrange pick‑up.

faq.q: Can I place a party order?
faq.a: Absolutely! Order 24 hours in advance for custom tubs and toppings.
